contentList.content: Big, strong, fast and wise, wolfkind are wolf-like humanoids; with wolfen ancestors. Their feet and hands are similar to those of the paws of their wolf ancestors, but their hands have evolved to be able to hold items. They are covered in fur like their lesser kin.
A frost wolf wolfkind's fur usually has a light gray or silvery tone to it.
Throw yourself to the wind on wings of terror.
They look so healthy. It would be a shame if they weren't. Deal increased damage to those who are at full HP.

As an action, you can unleash a magic-laced howl to debilitate those nearby. Every creature within a 15-foot radius from you must make a Constitution saving throw. Targets who fail this throw are shredded by the frosty pitch of your vocals.

The unfortunate splicing of a mortal's spirit with a demon's flesh through the ingenuity of bio-mechanical designs. War and conflict drove these mutants to escape their realm to seek shelter among the Astral Plane. They crave independence, and search for meaning for the ways they have been wronged.
Unleash your cybernetic capacitors upon your foes, dealing [1] per projectile fired.
Your demonic flesh and ventilation systems allow for heat discharge. You are resistant to fire damage.
End your foes with an eletrical discharge. Strike multiple targets with the blast.
Your anatomy does not permit poison contamination. You are resistant to Poison damage and cannot be poisoned.
The energies that sustain you grant you an increase to your lightning damage outputs.
Your attunement to the world shapes your perspective. You have Advantage on Perception checks.
Striking with your claws opens up an opportunity for a follow-up strike.
